Malden.Glove Cycle:
Glove Cycle is a public art installation by Mags Harries, located throughout the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority Porter subway and commuter rail station in Porter Square, Cambridge, Massachusetts. The artwork consists of 54 separate bronze pieces and was created with a budget of US$30,000.


== Sculpture ==
Glove Cycle is a sculptural installation of 54 separate bronze sculptures of gloves located throughout Porter station.
